name: Immigration Institute of the Bay Area
description: IIBA San Francisco staff provide immigration legal services, citizenship workshops, and free citizenship classes in San Francisco County. The Immigration Institute of the Bay Area (IIBA) helps immigrants, refugees, and their families join and contribute to the community. IIBA provides high-quality, affordable immigration legal services, education, and civic engagement opportunities. Consultations (By Appointment Only) Please call (415) 538-8100 ext. 206 to schedule a free initial consultation.
